column4: hey, i'm on a laptop here. when i pull my power plug and switch to battery, why does the display brightness drop, and charge back when i put it back?
power saving.. scren brightness uses power
there is a setting somewhere.. look for power saving stuff
suspending is just almost shutting the computer down.. it's still using power and running.. hibernation is saving everything to the hard drive, then shutting down, not using power
